instruction: Compose an email requesting a customer to fill out a review about their experience with your product.
output:
Dear [Name],

We hope you're enjoying your [product] that you purchased from us. We'd love to hear your feedback and make sure we are giving you the best product experience possible. 

We invite you to provide an honest review of your experience with our product. Your opinion helps create a better product and better customer service for our loyal customers. 

Let us know if you have any concerns or suggestions by submitting a review on our website. 

We appreciate your time and your loyalty.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
